did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Bibliographies, site study proposals and reports, correspondence, clippings, articles, transcripts, memos, training materials, notes, photographic contact sheets, negatives.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
did.abstract: Documents Ostrander's study of architecture and planning in senior housing and its effect on the aged.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Professor in the Dept. of Design and Environmental Analysis, Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, publications, reports and subject files relating to Ostrander's work in gerontology and nursing homes, particularly the New York State Veterans' Home in Oxford.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Human Ecology. Dept. of Design and Environmental Analysis.
New York State Veterans' Home (Oxford, N.Y.).

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Edward Ostrander papers, #23-16-3259. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
